form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: United States Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service, FORM G-325A ( (REV. 10-1-74)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 INSTRUCTIONS: USE TYPEWRITER. BE SURE ALL COPIES ARE LEGIBLE. Failure to answer fully all questions delays action. Do Not Remove Carbons: If typewriter is not available, print heavily in block letters with ball-point pen. U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE 1975 574-025 - FORM G-325A (REV. 10-1-74) Y IDSAA form Approved UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service CIT - 300 OMB Noz 43-R436 BIOGRAPHIC INFORMATION 8/14/80 (Family name) (First name) (Middle name) date) 4/10/91 MALE BIRTHDATE(Mo.-Day-Yr.) NATIONALITY ALIEN REGISTRATION NO. PHAM KE DUC FEMALE 08.01.1915 VIET NAM (If any) A21201153 ALL OTHER NAMES USED (Including names by previous marriages) CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH SOCIAL SECURITY NO. (If any) 586408685 FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME DATE, CITY AND COUNTRY OF BIRTH(If known) CITY AND COUNTRY OF RESIDENCE. PHAM VINH VIET NAM FATHER MOTHER(Maiden name) NGUYEN LAN VIET NAM HUSBAND (If none, so state) FAMILY NAME FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE CITY & COUNTRY OF BIRTH DATE OF MARRIAGE PLACE OF MARRIAGE OR (For wife, give maiden name) WIFE LE CHI 01.031915 VIET NAM 09.21.1946 VIETNAM FORMER HUSBANDS OR WIVES(if none, so state) FAMILY NAME (For wife, give maiden name) FIRST NAME BIRTHDATE DATE & PLACE OF MARRIAGE DATE AND PLACE OF TERMINATION OF MARRIAGE NONE APPLICANT'S RESIDENCE LAST FIVE YEARS. LIST PRESENT ADDRESS FIRST. FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR PRESENT TIME 1172 Main Street # 4 Westminster California United States April 1980 412 Phyllis D2 Killeen Texas same thinkinghor Bead California October May 1975 September 1977 6562 Farinella Dr same 1977 1027 Mission Dr # B Corta Mesa June 1979 same same July 1979 March 1980 APPLICANT'S LAST ADDRESS OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES OF MORE THAN ONE YEAR FROM TO STREET AND NUMBER CITY PROVINCE OR STATE COUNTRY MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR NONE APPLICANT'S EMPLOYMENT LAST FIVE YEARS. (IF NONE, so STATE.) LIST PRESENT EMPLOYMENT FIRST. FROM TO FULL NAME AND ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER OCCUPATION (SPECIFY) MONTH YEAR MONTH YEAR NONE PRESENT TIME Show below last occupation abroad if not shown above. (Include all information requested above.) THIS FORM IS SUBMITTED IN CONNECTION WITH APPLICATION FOR: SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT OR PETITIONER DATE NATURALIZATION ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS pharming 05.12.1980 OTHER (SPECIFY): IF YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IS IN OTHER THAN ROMAN LETTERS. WRITE YOUR NAME IN YOUR NATIVE ALPHABET IN THIS SPACE: Are all copies legible? Yes PENALTIES: SEVERE PENALTIES ARE PROVIDED BY LAW FOR KNOWINGLY AND WILLFULLY FALSIFYING OR CONCEALING A MATERIAL FACT.
